programme.title: The Gatling Gun
programme.desc: An Apache warrior chief is willing to offer gold, and even sacrifice some of his men, to get his hands on Richard J. Gatling's powerful invention. It's up to a cavalry lieutenant, his scout, and a tough rancher to end the chief's deadly ambition.

programme.title: The Deadly Companions
programme.desc: When a former Army officer accidentally kills a woman's young son, he offers to escort the grieving mother through dangerous Indian territory on the way to lay the boy to rest at the family homestead.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas' old Army buddy, Tom Benton, comes to North Fork raising a ruckus. Micah arrests him and Lucas bails him out. Benton, an undercover federal agent, wants to stay in jail to hopefully infiltrate a gang of bank robbers.

programme.title: War of the Wildcats
programme.desc: During the early days of the Oklahoma oil boom, a greedy, self-assured oilman and a quiet, yet determined cowboy fight for the rights to oil on Indian land. All the while a pretty schoolteacher steals both men's hearts.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas thinks he has seen a ghost when he comes face-to-face with Simon Lee, a young man who looks exactly like a Confederate officer he killed during the Civil War. Simon Lee is fast with a gun, and provokes Lucas into a life and death situation.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Marshal Micah Torrance loses his confidence in his job of authority and begins drinking again after an old enemy from the past terrorizes him. When Lucas learns of the situation, he invites the man to North Fork and convinces Micah to face his fears.

programme.title: Legends of the Pony Express
programme.desc: Heroic Pony Express riders and station keepers face deadly terrain, hostile Native Americans, and dangerous outlaws to deliver vital mail across the untamed frontier. Their life-and-death adventures unite the country and become the stuff of legends.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: Temple Houston, flamboyant son of Sam Houston, works hard to live up to his famous name as a top attorney in the Oklahoma Territory. But his flair for showmanship annoys his courtroom rivals, the Jennings brothers, and the feud erupts into bloodshed.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.sub-title: Annie Oakley & Buffalo Bill's Wild West Showdown
programme.desc: When Buffalo Bill adds female sharpshooter Lillian Smith to his Wild West show, it jeopardizes his relationship with the show's current star, Annie Oakley. As the rivalry between Annie and Lillian escalates, the future of the show is put at risk.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: English astronomers Charles Mason and Jeremiah Dixon brave deadly terrain and hostile Native Americans to resolve a border dispute in Colonial America. With science and courage, they survey their famous Mason-Dixon Line with pinpoint accuracy.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: With only eight cowboys left, the competition takes a dangerous turn as the contestants compete in a challenge with a raging bull to win the immunity belt buckle. Mayhem ensues, and one of the cowboys finds himself in a life-threatening situation. After a long talk, the two feuding cowboys realize the error or their ways and bury the hatchet. During the team challenge a steer escapes, and while most of the contestants try to correct their mistake, a few of them sit on the sidelines instead of helping their fellow teammates. Trace is left questioning their commitment to the competition. A female competitor refuses to criticize her teammates, which puts her in the hot seat and in danger of going home.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: College student, Ambrose Bulldog Merriweather, comes to Sweetwater. He wants to meet his Western idol, Jimmy Hickok. However, unbeknownst to him, the Pony Express ownership's plans could get him into trouble and put all of the riders in danger.

programme.title: The Gatling Gun
programme.desc: An Apache warrior chief is willing to offer gold, and even sacrifice some of his men, to get his hands on Richard J. Gatling's powerful invention. It's up to a cavalry lieutenant, his scout, and a tough rancher to end the chief's deadly ambition.

programme.title: The Deadly Companions
programme.desc: When a former Army officer accidentally kills a woman's young son, he offers to escort the grieving mother through dangerous Indian territory on the way to lay the boy to rest at the family homestead.

programme.title: The Warrant
programme.desc: Sheriff John Breaker and his son, Cal, reunite after the Civil War to track down a fellow veteran, now a notorious gang leader. Their mission turns dangerous when they find themselves caught between their former friend's outlaw gang and the vigilantes who are taking the law into their own hands. Starring Neal McDonough (Yellowstone, Captain America), Casper Van Dien (Starship Troopers, Tarzan), Steven R. McQueen (The Vampire Diaries, Chicago Fire), and Annabeth Gish (X-Files, The Haunting of Hill House).

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Micah, Lucas, and Mark are lost and fear they have crossed into dangerous Mexican territory. Their fears become reality when they stumble upon a ghost town and bandits take them prisoner. When Lucas sees Micah being tortured, he must act quickly.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: After Mexican bandits capture and hold Micah, Lucas, and Mark in a ghost town, Lucas devises a plan that will hopefully lead to freedom. Later, Lucas helps the wife of a bandit give birth, and the bandits finally release them.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lou Mallory, a beautiful red-headed lady, arrives in North Fork and quickly buys property, including Milly Scott's general store. Lucas learns she is quite the businesswoman, until she gets into trouble.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A stagecoach arrives in North Fork carrying two women, one of whom is gravely ill. Doc Burrage believes it's smallpox. Lou Mallory, Lucas, and both passengers quarantine alongside with another rider, Lee Coyle, a dangerous outlaw.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: Jim Beckwourth lives a life of adventure as a trapper, trader and adopted member of the Crow tribe. When America goes to war, Beckwourth becomes an army dispatch rider, a job that puts him and a young greenhorn on a collision course with the Pawnee.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: After a man murders his wife in a jealous rage and goes on the run, local lawmen are stunned when legendary Marshal Bass Reeves accepts responsibility for bringing the killer to justice...because the murderer is none other than Reeves' own son.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.sub-title: Willie Kennard Makes His Mark in History
programme.desc: Under siege by gunslingers, the gold mining town of Yankee Hill runs a newspaper advertisement to find a new marshal. Former slave and Union soldier Willie Kennard answers the ad, but he faces prejudice and doubt as he works to restore law and order.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: A gang of disorderly cowhands take over the town of Kingsburg. Fear grips the townspeople. The men try to create a disturbance to cover up a bank robbery. Cheyenne, who is traveling with them, steps in to support the marshal.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: An elderly couple move to North Fork and settle down under a false name to keep the town from knowing they are parents of a vicious killer on the loose. However, their plan fails when their son shows up and causes chaos.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A teenage girl named Heller and her brother are abused by her drunken stepfather. The town becomes aware after Heller is caught stealing from the general store. The children plan the drunk's demise as the cruelty continues. Lucas steps in to help.

programme.title: Black Fox
programme.desc: A former slave and his white blood brother have moved their families from the Carolinas to Texas. When the Civil War begins, their settlement is left unprotected from hostile Indian tribes and the former slave may be the only hope for peace.
